data.text: Do not be bothered/upset by what wicked people do.
because they will soon disappear, like grass withers in the hot sun and dries up.
Trust in Yahweh, and do what is good;
Be delighted with all that Yahweh does for you;
Commit to Yahweh all the things that you plan to do;
He will show as clearly as the sunlight that you ◄are innocent/have done nothing that is wrong►;
Be quiet in Yahweh’s presence, and wait patiently for him to do what you want him to do.
Do not be angry about what wicked people do.
Some day Yahweh will get rid of wicked people,
Soon the wicked will disappear.
But those who are humble will live safely in their land.
Wicked people plan to harm righteous/godly people;
But Yahweh laughs at them
Wicked people pull out their swords/daggers
But they will be killed by their own swords/daggers,
It is good to be righteous/godly even if you do not have many possessions,
because Yahweh will completely take away the strength of wicked people,
Every day Yahweh cares about those who have not done any evil things;
They will survive when calamities occur;
But wicked people will die;
The wicked people borrow money, but they are not able to repay it;
Those whom Yahweh has blessed will live safely in the land that he has given to them,
Yahweh protects those who do what is pleasing to him,
even if they stumble, they will not fall down,
I was young previously, and now I am an old man,
Righteous/Godly people are generous, and happily lend money to others,
Turn away from doing evil, and do what is good.
That will happen because Yahweh likes to see people doing what is just,
Righteous/Godly people will own the land that Yahweh promised to give to them,
Righteous people give wise advice to others,
They continually think about God’s laws;
Those who are evil wait in ambush for righteous people
But Yahweh will not abandon righteous people,
Be patient and trust that Yahweh will help you,
I have seen that wicked people who ◄act like tyrants/terrify people► sometimes prosper, like trees that grow well in fertile soil,
when I looked later, they were gone!
Notice the people who have not done evil things, those who act righteously:
But Yahweh will get rid of the wicked;
Yahweh rescues righteous people;
Yahweh helps them and saves them;
